Articles.Content:
> 
> You guys and your identical avatars! I just merged several posts, thinking they were the same person serial posting. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)
> Unfortunately, it can't be undone. I apologize. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> But it's actually your fault for all using the same avatar! ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)
> 
> But I am sorry. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> Seriously, it's confusing if you all use the same avatar. As a request/suggestion to avoid more confusion, how about you don't do that?

Hehehehehe...

All is going according to plan.

It is a bit confusing, though, isn't it? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

> 
> Hehehehehe...
> All is going according to plan.
> 
> It is a bit confusing, though, isn't it? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

Good thing my avatar is Dark Side, huh?
Good thing my avatar is the Light Side, huh?

> 
> Good thing my avatar is Dark Side, huh?

> 
> Good thing my avatar is the Light Side, huh?

You bums and your inverted avatars. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Gotta be original! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> You guys and your identical avatars! I just merged several posts, thinking they were the same person serial posting. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)
> Unfortunately, it can't be undone. I apologize. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> But it's actually your fault for all using the same avatar! ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)
> 
> But I am sorry. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> Seriously, it's confusing if you all use the same avatar. As a request/suggestion to avoid more confusion, how about you don't do that? Vary them a bit or something?

Hahaha xD I'll use the version pasted over my usual avatar ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Hahaha xD I'll use the version pasted over my usual avatar ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Oh, bah.

Stupid easy to merge 2D avatar images. I had to go and import the tank, clean it up, scale it right, add it to the dragon file, fiddle with the tank and dragon there, then set up the camera, and set the render to avatar resolution. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) (Which wasn't all that hard. You just type in "64" twice.)

> 
> You guys and your identical avatars! I just merged several posts, thinking they were the same person serial posting. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)
> Unfortunately, it can't be undone. I apologize. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> But it's actually your fault for all using the same avatar! ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)
> 
> But I am sorry. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> Seriously, it's confusing if you all use the same avatar. As a request/suggestion to avoid more confusion, how about you don't do that? Vary them a bit or something?

ROFL. I'll see what I can do.

Not my round-8. I shall never forget you\*Writes down that when I am a fourm veteran I must bring it up all the time\*

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Death to the Round-8!
> I just wanna watch the world burn.

Youve Betrayed us all!!

> 
> You guys actually have to engage Reddit in this, Squad doesn't care about the goings-on around here.

Consorting with the enemy?!

Desperate times...

> 
> You guys and your identical avatars! I just merged several posts, thinking they were the same person serial posting. ![k_angry.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_angry.gif)
> Unfortunately, it can't be undone. I apologize. ![k_sad.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_sad.gif) 
> 
> But it's actually your fault for all using the same avatar! ![k_angry.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_angry.gif) 
> 
> But I am sorry. ![k_sad.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_sad.gif) 
> 
> Seriously, it's confusing if you all use the same avatar. As a request/suggestion to avoid more confusion, how about you don't do that? Vary them a bit or something?

Will change momentarily

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-17T05:16:16Z" title="04/17/2015 05:16  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 17, 2015</time> by kmMango**

> 
> This is (unfortunately) for the video ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Please sir...... may I have some.... clouds (IN GAME!!!) ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Kind of tired adding the modded clouds packs, as much as I appreciate them. They not only add a great sense of altitude and atmosphere (literally and figuratively) when blasting off of Kerbin, but also it is SO much prettier once in orbit to look down. When I see screenshots from others looking down at a cloudless Kerbin, I think well, lesser of the poor Kerbals that have to look at a cloudless environment. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> You guys actually have to engage Reddit in this, Squad doesn't care about the goings-on around here.

This is their OFFICIAL forum FFS!!! And when are Squad going to speak up about the round-8???

 Come on Squad!

> 
> This is their OFFICIAL forum FFS!!! And when are Squad going to speak up about the round-8???
>  Come on Squad!

Round-8 issue aside, the influence that reddit has over squad is demoralizing. 

as you say Jim this is the "official forums FFS!!!". ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

> 
> Round-8 issue aside, the influence that reddit has over squad is demoralizing. 
> as you say Jim this is the "official forums FFS!!!". ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

..Have you been on the KSP subreddit?

I've looked. I didn't like it. I hate like the layout. 

The official forum is better and I like the people here.
Surely there would be some people who use both this forum and the SubReddit?

Is there a way you guys can change the re-purposing of the Round8?

Could we sign a petition (Or vote).

Is there even a slight chance we can change this decision?

Could you guys make a different tank for Xenon?

#Savethedount

DMSP signing off.
We should arrange to mail hundreds of doughnuts to SQUAD in protest.

> 
> I've looked. I didn't like it. I hate like the layout. 
> The official forum is better and I like the people here.

Yeah it's not good at all.. This forum is for the real MVPs.
Let's find a doughnut delivery in Mexico, where we can pay with credit card and... Spam SQUAD with them. Hope, they have enough people to eat them all

> 
> Let's find a doughnut delivery in Mexico, where we can pay with credit card and... Spam SQUAD with them. Hope, they have enough people to eat them all

this is an amazing idea! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Surely there would be some people who use both this forum and the SubReddit?

I go there every few days, but like many I hate the UI.

> 
> Let's find a doughnut delivery in Mexico, where we can pay with credit card and... Spam SQUAD with them. Hope, they have enough people to eat them all

Dont do it that is what they were after all along.

Seriously though great Idea. Quick someone find that info and post it here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I suppose we could go and give maxmaps and the others an earful (politely of course) during the squad cast later today.

> 
> We should arrange to mail hundreds of doughnuts to SQUAD in protest.

Well, it may be the only way for the official forums to communicate with Squad. I say go for it.

> 
> Well, it may be the only way for the official forums to communicate with Squad. I say go for it.

With messages written in the Box?

"Keep them if you let keep us our donut with LFO-icing!" ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
